name: this must be the place
description:
You are stranded on an alien planet with no hope of survival. Explore and find messages from others in your situation. 

Programming, design, art, and music by @lycaontalks. Made for Ludum Dare 39. The theme was "Running out of Power".

[This game was updated post-jam to fix a bug where on the final menu the cursor wouldn't show. It changed literally one line of code. The original is available still, the updated version has the "hotfix" suffix.]

Additional credits:

  • Some textures sourced from the Pixar One Twenty Eight Library
  • Sounds from freesound by klankbeeld and revolt2563
  • Icons sourced from flaticon by Freepik [1] [2] [3] and Icomoon [1]. 
  • Special thanks to Talking Heads.
